column5: We are going to be fishing lotw the middle of september and was just wondering what to expect for weather. Thanks Alot Dog
Been to the NE Quandrant twice in September. 2002 and 2005. Lots of fronts. Lots of wind.
Thats the area that we're going to, what camp did you stay at? Dog

Cooler in the morning, jacket and stocking hat running from spot to spot. Warms up by noon and somedays it can be t-shirt weather. But it can get nasty and stay nasty. You should probably plan on bringing everything from your snowsuit to your speedo. Good luck.

Go to www.weatherunderground.com You can look up Kenora (close enough) and view the historic weather data for the last 10 years. About a third of the way down the page is a section that says history and Almanac. Just enter your date range and you can see what the weather was like on September 20, 1999.
we are going up the first week of september to the ash rapids area of LOTW. has anybody fished this area at that time and have any pointers for that area??
You should have a great time. They just posted some fantastic photo's of recent musky catches.http://www.ashrapidslodge.com
